nodes.bodyText: "JAR files to find linkage errors in"
exclusion file to suppress linkage errors.
Might be worth having an overloaded method to avoid the null argument.

Created overloaded method.
What do you think about applying builder pattern? Created #1321
This big try-catch is split  into two: one for default exclusion rule and the other for the argument.
JAR files that are entry points for reachability analysis
Updated to JAR files to specify entry point classes in reachability. The reachability analysis is on classes, not JAR files. If you think of a better word than define or specify, let me know.
this is called exclusion file elsewhere.
Madd LinkageChecker.create(classPath) public; the dashboard does not use reachability analysis or exclusion files.
